hizbs.text: huwa alladhi khalaqakum min nafsin wahidatin wajaʿala min'ha zawjaha liyaskuna ilayha falamma taghashaha hamalat hamlan khafifan famarrat bihi falamma athqalat daʿawa l-laha rabbahuma la-in ataytana salihan lanakunanna mina l-shakirina
falamma atahuma salihan jaʿala lahu shurakaa fima atahuma fataʿala l-lahu ʿamma yush'rikuna
ayush'rikuna ma la yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laquna
wala yastatiʿuna lahum nasran wala anfusahum yansuruna
wa-in tadʿuhum ila l-huda la yattabiʿukum sawaon ʿalaykum adaʿawtumuhum am antum samituna
inna alladhina tadʿuna min duni l-lahi ʿibadun amthalukum fa-id'ʿuhum falyastajibu lakum in kuntum sadiqina
alahum arjulun yamshuna biha am lahum aydin yabtishuna biha am lahum aʿyunun yub'siruna biha am lahum adhanun yasmaʿuna biha quli id'ʿu shurakaakum thumma kiduni fala tunziruni
inna waliyyiya l-lahu alladhi nazzala l-kitaba wahuwa yatawalla l-salihina
wa-alladhina tadʿuna min dunihi la yastatiʿuna nasrakum wala anfusahum yansuruna
wa-in tadʿuhum ila l-huda la yasmaʿu watarahum yanzuruna ilayka wahum la yub'siruna
khudhi l-ʿafwa wamur bil-ʿur'fi wa-aʿrid ʿani l-jahilina
wa-imma yanzaghannaka mina l-shaytani nazghun fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi innahu samiʿun ʿalimun
inna alladhina ittaqaw idha massahum taifun mina l-shaytani tadhakkaru fa-idha hum mub'siruna
wa-ikh'wanuhum yamuddunahum fi l-ghayi thumma la yuq'siruna
wa-idha lam tatihim biayatin qalu lawla ij'tabaytaha qul innama attabiʿu ma yuha ilayya min rabbi hadha basairu min rabbikum wahudan warahmatun liqawmin yu'minuna
wa-idha quri-a l-qur'anu fa-is'tamiʿu lahu wa-ansitu laʿallakum tur'hamuna
wa-udh'kur rabbaka fi nafsika tadarruʿan wakhifatan waduna l-jahri mina l-qawli bil-ghuduwi wal-asali wala takun mina l-ghafilina
inna alladhina ʿinda rabbika la yastakbiruna ʿan ʿibadatihi wayusabbihunahu walahu yasjuduna
